title: Crypto ally Paul Atkins sworn in to replace Gary Gensler atop U.S. SEC
summary: Crypto ally Paul Atkins was sworn in as SEC chairman, replacing Gary Gensler, who was in the crosshairs of many of the industry's acolytes
